short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See our Energy Savings Tool running on your favourite retailer and manufacturer sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our innovative tool provides energy insights, showing energy costs and savings for appliances as well as alternatives that save you money on energy costs.

When you browse dishwashers, freezers, fridge freezers, fridges, tumble dryers, washer dryers and washing machines on retailer and manufacturer websites, you will see our tool added to the page providing information about energy costs and savings for each product. See some examples on the websites listed below:

Austria: Bosch
Bulgaria: AEG
Croatia: Electrolux
France: Boulanger, Electro Depot, Rosières
Germany: Bosch, Miele
Greece: Kotsovolos, Public
Hungary: AEG, Electrolux
Italy: Trony, Unieuro
Netherlands : Miele
Romania: Electrolux
Spain: El Corte Inglés

If you would like us to add support for another website please get in touch: support@youreko.com.
